law.catch_line: On review of the information required under § 19-1401.1 of this subtitle and any other information ...
law.text:
On review of the information required under § 19-1401.1 of this subtitle and any other information that is relevant to the ability of the applicant to operate a nursing home, the Secretary may:
Approve an application for a license or license renewal;
Deny an application for a license or license renewal; or
Approve an application for license or license renewal subject to conditions.
